channel.title: CTO and Co-Founder Talk with Dave Albert
channel.itunes:subtitle: A show about Technology and Startup life
channel.itunes:author: Dave Albert
channel.itunes:summary: Where I discuss what it's like being a first-time CTO and Co-Founder. The joys, the decision, and the challenges. I hope this helps others in similar situations or aspire to the same.
channel.description: Where I discuss what it's like being a first-time CTO and Co-Founder. The joys, the decision, and the challenges. I hope this helps others in similar situations or aspire to the same.

item.title: Hello World, being a CTO and Co-Founder
item.itunes:author: Dave Albert
item.itunes:subtitle: An introduciton to me, One15, and this podcast.
item.itunes:summary: This episode I introduce myself, One15 and the podcast. Email: podcast@dave-albert.com Twitter: https://twitter.com/dave_albert Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/dave.albert/ Websites: https://one15.co | https://dave-albert.com

item.title: Choosing Digital Ocean over AWS
item.itunes:author: Dave Albert
item.itunes:subtitle: Choosing Digital Ocean over AWS
item.itunes:summary: This episode I explain the decision to choose Digital Ocean over Amazon AWS. Email: podcast@dave-albert.com Digital Ocean Free Credit: https://m.do.co/c/16b16e2a7fb9 Twitter: https://twitter.com/dave_albert Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/dave.albert/ Websites: https://one15.co | https://dave-albert.com

item.title: User Productivity Tools We Use
item.itunes:author: Dave Albert
item.itunes:subtitle: User Productivity Tools We Use
item.itunes:summary: This episode I explain our decisions to choose different user productivity tools. Email: podcast@dave-albert.com Digital Ocean Free Credit: https://m.do.co/c/16b16e2a7fb9 Twitter: https://twitter.com/dave_albert Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/dave.albert/ Websites: https://one15.co | https://dave-albert.com Tools: https://gsuite.google.com/ https://trello.com/ https://www.atlassian.com/software/confluence https://workplace.fb.com/ https://bitbucket.org/

item.title: I am back, NDRC Accelerator, Startups are hard
item.itunes:author: Dave Albert
item.itunes:subtitle: I am finally back and some of the struggles we have been through.
item.itunes:summary: This episode I talk about the challenges we have had, and the NDRC accelerator program that we have been through. I also talk a bit about the agile challenges and quirks of AWS credits and how Azure credits are very compelling. Email: podcast@dave-albert.com Twitter: https://twitter.com/dave_albert Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/dave.albert/ Websites: https://dave-albert.com | https://medit.online

item.title: National Analytics Conference Ireland, and AWS User group.
item.itunes:author: Dave Albert
item.itunes:subtitle: Talking about the search for a new data person, story telling and Terraform.
item.itunes:summary: This episode I talk about attending the National Analytics Conference Ireland where I'm looking for a new data science/ML/AI type, and an AWS user group meetup where I fell in love with Terraform. Email: podcast@dave-albert.com Twitter: https://twitter.com/dave_albert Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/dave.albert/ Websites: https://dave-albert.com | https://medit.online
